DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the positioning of customized guides designed from patients X-Rays (Materialise X-Ray Knee Guides) using computed tomography in primary total knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Materialise X-ray Knee Guides for Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Physically and mentally able and willing to comply with the protocol Be treated for a primary total knee arthroplasty Are fluent in Dutch or French Sign the Informed Consent Form Comply with the indications listed in the Instructions for Use Be able to undergo a CT scan Fulfilling one of the contraindications mentioned in the Instructions for Use Pregnant A prisoner Reported to have mental illness or belonged to a vulnerable population
